glsa.title: Pango: Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in Pango could result in a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: Library for layout and rendering of internationalized text.

description.p: Processing certain invalid Emoji sequences in a GTK+ application can trigger a reachable assertion resulting in an application crash.

impact.p: A remote attacker could provide a specially crafted Emoji sequences, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Pango users should upgrade to the latest version:
